@@ -26,0 +26,1 @@

@@ -27,0 +28,1 @@
+#include "gc/shenandoah/shenandoahThreadLocalData.hpp"
@@ -28,5 +30,5 @@

-  if (!UseShenandoahGC) {        \
-    tty->print_cr("skipped");    \
-    return;                      \
-  } int suppress_empty_statement_warning
+#define SKIP_IF_NOT_SHENANDOAH()                                                \
+  if (!UseShenandoahGC || !ShenandoahHeap::heap()->mode()->is_generational()) { \
+    tty->print_cr("skipped");                                                   \
+    return;                                                                     \
+  }
